name: NYC Dating Simulator
description:
Is your type a bratty goth girl? A jaded LA surfer? An earthy barista? Look no further! The only caveat is that, in New York City, not only are their personalities insufferable, and they are insufferably hot too! Try your luck at a getting a date with your type by jumping through their conversational hoops!

IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THIS GAME FULL SCREEN
